objective: I have a keen interest in server management, cryptography, cybersecurity, and web and application development, I have always been appreciated and acknowledged for my debugging and troubleshooting skills and coming up with intriguing and interesting solutions, I maintain and develop open source projects have worked with services including but not limited to git VCS and Jenkins.
